svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 426px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #0066CC;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#0066CC, #56aeff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #CC9900;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#CC9900, #966a00); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 541px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #9900CC;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#9900CC, #ff9cff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 531px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #009900;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#009900, #32b532); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 45px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 887px; margin-left: 382px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Legend:
━━━ Inheritance (extends)
┈┈┈▷ Implementation (implements)
◇─── Aggregation (wraps)
Pattern Structure:
• Component: Base interface
• ConcreteComponent: Basic object
• Decorator: Wraps Component
• ConcreteDecorators: Add features
Key Feature:
Decorators can wrap other
decorators, enabling layered
functionality!

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 337px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 657px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Decoration Flow:
1. SimpleCoffee provides
base functionality
2. CoffeeDecorator wraps
a Coffee object
3. Concrete decorators
(WithMilk, WithSugar)
extend the decorator
4. Each decorator adds its
own cost/description
to the wrapped object
5. Decorators can be
stacked infinitely!
Result: Flexible composition
without subclass explosion

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 583px; margin-left: 481px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 612px; margin-left: 452px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 577px; margin-left: 712px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Advantages:
✓ Add responsibilities dynamically
✓ More flexible than inheritance
✓ Avoid feature-laden classes
✓ Single Responsibility Principle
✓ Open/Closed Principle
Use When:
• Need to add responsibilities
to objects dynamically
• Extension by subclassing
is impractical

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
